name: Distance Forums - Dark Edgy
description:
Dark color scheme for the new Distance Forums theme. The theme includes:
  • A completely dark theme for the most common pages
  • A sticky navigation menu
  • Square avatars
  • All things edgy - no more round borders, yay!
  • Minor visual changes and rearrangements to certain parts (e.g. activity info in UCP, "Online" dot now square :3)
If you want a theme based more on the original style, try Ciastex' userstyle: Distance Forums - Dark
additional_info:
1.0.2 - Removed block display of images in signature (requested by Californ1a), recolored post edit info border, recolored (info) alert boxes
1.0.1 - Fixed login panel color at the forum page, changed activity info visually in the UCP
1.0.0 - Initial release
